website_summaries.verdict: A super sturdy utilitarian cart with a cutting board top that makes it perfect if you want to serve cocktails with garnishes.
pros: This wire cart has a simple design, is easy to put together, and is strong enough to hold up to 300 lbs
Has wheels so it’s easy to move around
cons: Unsteady for glassware and bottles placed upright or outside the basket

website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a reasonably-priced kitchen cart with a cutting surface, storage space, and easy assembly, this is the one to get.
pros: Crafted in handsome, chrome-plated steel with a brushed finish stainless steel top
Easy, no-tool assembly – some owners brag that they put it together in less than 20 minutes
cons: Legs tend to be somewhat wobbly

website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel top to cart has good longevity and will look great in modern kitchens.
pros: Durable and tough microwave cart with an all-steel design
Top measures 24 by 20 inches, meaning it will hold many different sized microwaves
Rubber wheels yield a good grip on hard floors
Stainless steel top can support up to 300 pounds for very heavy microwaves
cons: Makes use of plastic clips in the assembly process

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price. Finish could be more refined to be 5 stars. I added some strong magnetic hooks and use it on my deck as a grill table. Took about 5 minutes to put together. You could do it without tools but I used a mallet to get a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: b. nitram

customer_reviews.title: This product cannot support the advertised weight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart specifically because the product description said it can support >300lbs. I set it up and as soon as I put an appliance (<100lbs) on top, the cart listed over and nearly toppled. The components slide together to assemble this cart, rather than tightening with screws and bolts, which makes the overall construction wobbly and unsteady. It's probably fine for light-weight items, and the appearance and materials all look fine, but I definitely would not recommend this product for any weight-bearing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: dlw519

customer_reviews.title: Best Stainless Cart!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these carts I have purchased and they are excellent quality. My first purchased in 2015, second in 2018. They are VERY EASY to assemble with no tools. Not sure if they are rated for outdoor, but my original one has been outside in South Florida weather since it arrived in 2015-no problems or rust. The casters are very good commercial quality and the top is very thick stainless steel and can hold lots of weight without bending or bowing. The packaging is very sturdy and the product arrives intact with almost all recyclable contents-no styro and very little plastic bags. I highly recommend this product and will use Seville for all stainless I need.
customer_reviews.author: CKN

customer_reviews.title: Not easy top assemble
customer_reviews.text: So the concept is nice but...the "sleeves" fit nicely around the pole legs but when it came time to put the connection together "No Go" they would not fit into the bottom shelf brace. I resorted to electrical tape that I wrapped tapered down so it would adjust. I had them placed correctly the top side up. Just would not fit at all wd-40, soft mallet...very frustrating. Also the wheels do not lock...on off both the same still rolls. But it should serve my purpose for PMC oven holder.
customer_reviews.author: melissa odom

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!!! A piece of Crap!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I got this thing together & rolled ir into the kitchen, already, it began to fall apart. I put the countertop dishwasher on it, when to move it to get in one of the closets the thing leaned toward me is if it were going to fall down!! I had just put three p9ictures of water into the machine, & I and the table was leaning over!! I was too afraid that the machine would fall over, so I had to strain my back to lift it off!! I wished I has bought something far better!! Don't waist your money!! This is nothing but pure junk!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linus Oakerie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in every way.
customer_reviews.text: Having run a fabrication department that specialized in using stainless steel, I can tell you that the welds are bare minimum. They won't survive any kind of industrial or commercial setting. Definitely should have went with a thicker gauge metal on the basket rails. Super flimsy. I've seen plastic with less flexibility. Not to mention that I had to wait an additional few weeks for the poles to be delivered because they were initially missed. I can say it is perfect for my countertop dishwasher. It would be fine for low wear and tear applications such as this.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Unstable for heavy duty use!
customer_reviews.text: After I assembled this cart, the first thing I noticed was that the stainless steel top shelf DID NOT snap securely onto the balance of the assembly. Due to the instability of the top, when I set something heavy on the top, the legs leaned forward and I feared the whole cart would collapse. I also had to secure the drawer/basket with fasteners or it would detach from the cart when the drawer was opened. I'm very disappointed with this product and went to a different vendor to purchase a cart that is like other carts I have in my kitchen and garage.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I expected better quality for the price. Yes assembly is easy however the clamps that keep the legs in place easily come undone and this makes it difficult to keep up with all the pieces. I tried replacing the clamps with tape after they wouldn’t all stay in place and hold properly. Of course, then the table became even less sturdy than it already was. Eventually, I just settled for removing the whole bottom portion and only used the top piece as a huge cutting board. Shortly after purchasing this one for about $80+ , someone showed me theirs of seemingly better quality that they purchased for half the price. I am quite disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janeekweah

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart is great! I purchased a commercial meat slicer for my kitchen and it took up too much space on my island so I ordered this cart due to the fact it could hold over 300lbs and this cart works great. It was so easy to assemble and once I have the slicer on top I can roll it out of the way when not in use but can easily roll it up to the counter when I want to use the slicer. I love the stainless steel which fits with my kitchen appliances.
customer_reviews.author: alvinleejohnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cart for portable diswasher
customer_reviews.text: The top is heavy and looks fantastic. The legs make the whole cart a little questionable. Have to have the shelf in just the right spot to keep the whole thing from tipping over. It's easy to wheel and turn. Have never used the locking feet but it fits our portable dishwasher perfectly. Overall this is the perfect size and height for what I was looking for and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: So functional!
customer_reviews.text: I wish assembly instructions would have been included. I found them online with the product information. Assembly took me about 20 minutes. I love the functionality of this cart. It looks great in my kitchen. It's taller than I thought it would be and I'm so glad because it's the same height as my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie4Paws

customer_reviews.title: Great working cart.
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with stainless steel. I use this at a reloading stations for shotgun shells. Works great and sliding tray is nice to hold all my reloading tools.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Chau

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This a terrific cart! It is very sturdy, easy to put together (two people are definitely a good idea as it is quite heavy), and has excellent, easy to understand instructions for assembly (always appreciated). The wheels move smoothly around the kitchen and the steel top is great for hot pans. I was so pleased with its ease of construction, I would give it 10 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: It really is 'stainless'
customer_reviews.text: This is the second winter I've had this cart. I keep it outside under a roof cover by the BBQ, but still it gets wet. However...it hasn't rusted or shown any signs of weather damage. I've had other stainless steel products that don't use stainless steel screws, so they rust onto the stainless steel making it look bad. This cart is high quality and very useful being counter top height, plus it looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Emmalee

customer_reviews.title: A very fine product
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen stand with wheels was VERY EASY to assemble. Took less time to assemble than to open the box. Arrived in good time, securely packed, no damage or flaws. Very useful in our kitchen. Moves around smoothly, has a quickly removable metal basket and a bottom shelf. What more could you ask for in a kitchen stand? Wi-fi?
customer_reviews.author: R. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Chef’s Helper!
customer_reviews.text: Great little work cart! Easy assembly, no issues with dents or scratches, just an all around good utility cart for the kitchen. Big wheels with sturdy breaks, roomy drawer, and at the $100 price point you can’t beat this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Booterbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Great cart for the price. It does have some discoloration on the tabletop portion that doesn’t seem to be removable. There were zero instructions included. It’s not the easiest thing to build especially with no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Trimmer

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: Great little cart. It is sturdy and strong. Used for a 60 lb piece of kitchen equipment on it that is 27" tall. It doesn't feel top heavy at all. There is no racking and is sturdy when moved around. The basket is great for keeping the equipment specific parts organized in one place.Only wish an extra basket and brackets were available for purchase or was an option, because there is enough room for it. The whole cart from the wheels, supports, basket, inserts and top are of good quality. Will purchase again. Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This table is great. Comes in a small box, ready to assemble, not tools required. The shelve is very useful. I an currently using this table as a stand for my heat press. It manages the weight with no issues and it still rolls effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: My Kitchen sidekick.
customer_reviews.text: Add more needed shelf space for my tiny kitchen., Rolls easily. Cleans easily. I have its shelves already loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Lorin M.

customer_reviews.title: This product is an absolute piece of crap! The middle basket is a slide in and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is an absolute piece of crap! The middle basket is a slide in and out therefor there is no middle support for the leggs! That make the whole cart wobbly as hell !
customer_reviews.author: Mario R.

customer_reviews.title: Just as ordered
customer_reviews.text: Came undamaged, on time and was exactly what I ordered. I purchased this to hold a portable dishwasher and it is perfect. It hasn't damaged our wood floor either, which is a plus, as we move it often to return the dishwasher to the closet. Sturdy design and easy to put together quickly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome (and a steal at the price)
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous-looking product, superb quality, easy to assemble. And looks like a $300 product (I paid about $95). It's also at exactly the right height (kitchen counter top) and also great for using with a chopped and cutting board. Great product and very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I do love this little cart. However I do not love the second “shelf” basket. It is flimsy at best. I wish it had two solid shelves as opposed to the second basket shelf. I would love to replace the shelf with something more secure. Just go in knowing that while it’s real good there’s room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: 00kami

customer_reviews.title: Great, I’m very happy with the quality and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very sturdy and even the smaller size is big and I can store a lot of things there. The stainless steel top is very thick and makes it look more expensive than it actually is. It really helped me to organize my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea V

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 1 year ago for outdoor use and it's held up great!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with my stainless steel table. I purchased it a year ago to use as a prep table outside with my stainless steel grill. After a year outside there are no signs of rust and the steel still looks great! I do keep it covered, I found this cover fits it quite well
customer_reviews.author: MattHTX

customer_reviews.title: Solid cart
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how sturdy this cart is. I have my 70 lb. ice cream machine on the top shelf and it easily handles that weight. I was worried that the cart would wobble while the ice cream machine is running, but it doesn't move at all. The appearance is that of something you'd typically see in a restaurant kitchen or workplace, so it does look a little out of place in my kitchen, but it has a clean look to it and the ice cream machine has the same chrome finish so it looks good on this cart. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GaryD

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cart/work surface.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cart. I use it in my kitchen for making pastries. It's a good work height, and I like that I can roll it around and store stuff in it. It is easy to clean too. The only two drawbacks that I have found it that it gets scratched pretty easily and the wheels don't really lock that well, meaning it moves pretty easily when they are in the locked position. I would still but it again, as I said, it works pretty well for a kitchen cart.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this in less than five minutes. It is sturdy and the sliding basket/drawer was an added bonus. If I needed another one, I would purchase this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Mars Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This the second one I have purchased. The first was for my heavy KitchenAid mixer so that I could just roll it near the counter when needed. The second is for extra counter space in a smallish condo kitchen. This is a great product that is both sturdy and attractive. The stainless top is of excellent quality. Also, my husband assembled it in a few minutes each time.
customer_reviews.author: NBT

customer_reviews.title: Cart is tight and strong!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however no assembly instructions were included, but with patience one can figure it out from the photograph. Update! Instructions can be found on the web, actually pretty simple. When assembled, cart is tight and strong and evens up with the countertop. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: mickc66

customer_reviews.title: Big wheels keep on rolling
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece so I purchased two of these. The only problem is that the locks on the wheels don’t work and they tend to move
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble if you've used the two-sided plastic 'anchors' at each level the rack , drawer, or top needs, it's a breeze. (just need a rubber mallet). The tires are rubber (from the smell), so I did put duct tape around them (latex and rubber cause discoloration on luxury vinyl tiles and vinyl flooring in general), and they still roll well . The unit is sturdy, and makes a perfect cart for my low-cal naturally sweetened beverages, to reload the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: JillinoisRNTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: ugly corners on top
customer_reviews.text: The corners on the top of the card are poorly finished, see my picture. The sliding shelf slides way too easily and there is no stop to keep it from pulling out (in either direction).
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workstation
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT for our kitchen. If you're looking for a makeshift island/work station this is ideal. We were worried that the quality would be low because of the low cost, but the quality far exceeds what was expected. Pros: Easy to keep clean Drawer slides out Storage capacity seems higher than expected Very easy assembly Wheels are removable and can be replaced with included rubber feet Wheels have brakes (which many of the more expensive kitchen carts don't) Stainless steel matches everything unlike the composite wood that many others are made of Cons: Honestly can't think of anything
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rolling stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice movable Ninja Stand. Holds 2 and accessories. Top of the line product. Easy to clean. Rolls up to counter or cook in place
customer_reviews.author: George Pelissier

customer_reviews.title: 24x30 would make a perfect size
customer_reviews.text: A little on the light side, top even though i knew the dimensions is a little smaller than i would like. it would be perfect though if it was 24x 30. Height is perfect, this my 3rd purchase from Seville
customer_reviews.author: Hollerdog

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I am 69 and did it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi B

customer_reviews.title: Quality stainless steel table
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a slap table in my brand new pizzeria for stretching dough on. Quality of the table is really good. I love the rack drawer underneath. I use it to store my slice trays. We have a really small kitchen so this exact size was perfect. Only wish that the locking mechanisms were on all 4 wheels and i wish the wheels had more of a grip on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart! I'm using it as a computer cart, instead of a kitchen cart, and it works great! I'm able to keep my keyboard and headset in the basket and other items on the bottom shelf. I love that it rolls so I can move it when I need to. I have a large screen all-in-one pc (23" monitor) and was having a lot of trouble finding a moveable computer cart that would accommodate a large pc instead of a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat Mama

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect size, and compliments my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart for my new convection oven. It is perfect size, and compliments my kitchen. I can store supplies underneath on the bottom shelf, and hand towels or storage bags in the pull out shelf. It's well made and sturdy. Love it Love it Love it!!! It is the same height as my oven and the sink, so everything is unison. 👌🏾
customer_reviews.author: British & Totally Bionic 🇬🇧

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a good small table. I've used this type of restaurant wire shelving for years. I needed something to put my new Hamilton Beach Electrics mixer on that was heavy duty and also fit in the space open in my kitchen. This unit is good. Because I'd had experience with this type of shelving, putting it together was easy. The table is only very slightly wobbly, which is why I didn't give it 5 stars. I plan on buying a standalone shelf to be added and remove the top wire drawer. This will make it more functional for me, and also more sturdy. I have no problem recommending this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Marky Nark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far! It is the perfect size for my small apartment as I don't have much counter space, well much space at all lol.
customer_reviews.author: Arenee1370

customer_reviews.title: Super cart!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart to put my small stainless steel Holland grill on, and will leave it on the deck. The cart is very sturdy, has good wheels, and was simple to assemble. I've always gotten excellent response time when I've ordered products from Amazon, and this cart was no exception' it was here in a matter of days, right on my front doorstep. Although not all the cart is stainless steel, the remainder is hard chromed, so it shouldn't rust on my deck. I'm very pleased with the quality of this cart, and would recommend it to anyone interested in buying one! Gordon S. Beatrice, Ne.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon S. @ Beatrice, Ne.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice small kitchen cart
customer_reviews.text: Very nice small kitchen cart. Purchased to hold an espresso machine and grinder along with a tea maker. May prove to be a bit small for the purposes I'd planned but, if it is, we'll move it onto the deck to use while grilling. Cinch to put together. Really was "no tools required". Very stable. Did not use the casters because it's on a wooden floor and the wheels would slide too easily. The supplied feet work very well. Nice looking and I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: cch1950

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably useful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I wanted a solid rolling cart for the kitchen and this more than met my expectations. Very sturdy, solid, and used multiple times/day. It's worth 4 times what it cost, and I just wish I had run into this product sooner! I have a small studio apartment and this is a God-send! It gets used for just about everything! And the fact that it is stainless makes clean up a breeze--much easier to care for than wood. I really want to buy another but I don't know if I have room! I am purchasing one for a family member this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is perfect for what I was looking for. I needed a stand to place my Sharp XEA407 Advanced Reporting Cash Register. This is the perfect size for the register and the credit card terminal to stand on. The wheels are optional. As I didn't need it to be mobile I just used the pegs provided and placed the wheels aside. It is sturdy and durable feeling. Only thing I wasn't too fond of was that basket drawer. I'd prefer an actual drawer or just another shelf. Even with that I still give it 5 stars! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Conner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My son, a culinary student suggested that we purchase a prep table for our kitchen in order to give us a more effective prep space. Our kitchen is too small for an island. After reading many reviews, I decided on this prep table. I'm very pleased. It came perfectly packed, damage free, easy to following assembly instructions. It fits perfectly, and is exactly what we needed. Very sturdy. The basket and wire shelf are being used for storage. I like the fact that you have the option of wheels or legs. We opted for the legs. The stainless steel compliments our appliances.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyB

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy. I have an SPT tabletop dishwasher on it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy. I have an SPT tabletop dishwasher on it and I wheel it in and out of my kitchen (linoleum --> carpet) and it goes just fine. Sometimes I push the bottom with my foot to make it easier to transition, but so far I love having this thing. I wish it had been a little lower in price, but if it continues to hold up over time I'll be satisfied with the purchase. Plus it's easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: tb

customer_reviews.title: Great car for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great car for kitchen, desk or serving car!! It's very easy to put together I love it and what love the most was the price !!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Long

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the portable dishwasher we bought and I love the storage underneath but it isn't very durable. The black clips kept popping off during the installation and the basket doesn't sit evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany K.

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen island cart
customer_reviews.text: great size for a kitchen with no room for an Island. We put a butcher block on top of it and now we can roll it around where we need to chop. Its great. I wish I could add another shelf to it though.
customer_reviews.author: LindaG

customer_reviews.title: Really like this stainless steel cart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart to use with a large Wolfgang Puck pressure toaster oven. Works like a charm and I have a place to store all my toaster oven pans, utensils, etc. The cart is easy to put together and easy to clean. Since I have a small kitchen which is a short hall away from my office, I roll the oven into the office when it is not being used. I like not using up counter space with an appliance that is not being used every day.
customer_reviews.author: Word Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. However, would be better if the fixed legs were longer to match the length of the wheels. I'd prefer two wheels (with lock) and two fixed legs for my purposes since I don't intend to move it too often (usually just when cleaning), but using the four fixed position feet lowers the countertop height too low below the kitchen counter (whereas it is just at countertop height wit wheels on)
customer_reviews.author: TheDoppelganger

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and substantial.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, feels very substantial, and rolls easily. Looks great. My only small complaint is that the basket (middle shelf) feels a little thin, especially where it slides, but I don't plan to use it to slide in and out, so that part doesn't affect my use. If you were going to be removing that basket often, it feels like the metal could have been a little thicker and finished more evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Thorton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Utility Cart
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and really nice looking. We bought this to put a mini-fridge on so we could roll it from here to there and back. I really like it and we can put a lot of things in the baskets, from drinks to condiments, etc. Very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Red Bigly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase to accommodate my SPT Portable Dishwasher; which didn’t quite fit on my countertop. (Very small apartment) Setup was quick and easy. I love the option of a stationary or wheel setup! Very pleased with this purchase and would recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very attractive
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the workstation to hold our rotisserie - with all the spices, utensils, accessories, etc. stored underneath. It's easy to wheel out to the patio if we're eating outside - and to keep the cooking smells out of the house. On rainy days, we just wheel it to the kitchen. Otherwise, it's stored in a corner. Though it's attractive enough that I'd leave it in the kitchen if we had the room. Easy to assemble and very, very solid. The wheels are larger - and I presume stronger - than the ones on the laundry sorter from the same vendor.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Rolls easy on a wood deck and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This a very handy little cart. It is light weight but stable for its construction. Rolls easy on a wood deck and is easy to clean. It took me about 20 minutes to assemble including getting parts out of the box. Basket level is adjustable. I am contemplating getting another to cut legs down to a short cart for my smoker as the top installs by friction. So legs could be cut to another length.
customer_reviews.author: CYR

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this for my prep stain holds for and veggies.Easy to put together no tools.Down side my top came dented in two places.Great product for the money.Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my craft room!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very, very happy with this sturdy, functional, good-looking and easy-to-assemble cart. I wanted something to put my fairly heavy small kiln on and used the other two shelves for other craft-related items such as a toaster oven and tumbler. I still managed to fit a couple other small appliances on the shelves as well. I am so happy to get all of those items in this small space! If I can find another use for one, I won't hesitate to get another. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy J.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy - Even for alternative purpose
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a printer stand and it's awesome! We have an inket we put on the bottom level, a larger laser/scanner/copier on the top, and the paper fits perfectly in the tray. It can be easily pulled out to unplug/plug, etc. It was easy to put together, good quality. So even if you aren't using this like we did, and instead for it's intended purpose, I dont think you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: pandash99

customer_reviews.title: in a small apartment
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a small apartment with a kitchen that literally has 1' of counter space and that is always taken up by the dish rack. I put this beauty on the other end of my stove and its like I have a counter now. Its good quality materials clearly built to last.the baskets are big and deep providing good storage (i put breads and rolls in top basket and pans in the bottom). top is super easy to clean and the wheels make moving it a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart because of the Stainless Steel top. I also get additional counter space. It is beautiful and very heavy duty. Very easy to put together and no tools are required. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Oxley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Simple, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had a spot in my kitchen between the stove and fridge that should have had a cabinet - but didn't for whatever reason. I was at a loss what to do with this area, besides putting the garbage can there. I wanted a functional space with additional counter space and something that could be moved around if needed. Problem was it was a tight space 24" wide. Hard to find a cart that small. However after searching, I found it! Fits PERFECT! and it matches my stainless appliance nicely. Its sturdy and is not cheaply made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mellowjade

customer_reviews.title: It is almost excellent
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy stainless steel workstation is strong and easy to clean once set up. It was well packaged. I did find it somewhat difficult to slide the shelves over the adjoining plastic clips, as they didn't clip together tightly, so they would separate and slide down. The wheels can lock, or not, and they move easily. The shelf height can be adjusted. Quality control seemed to be doing its job; thankfully everything fit.
customer_reviews.author: Northern SW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I waited for a couple of weeks after it was delivered before I decided to put it together. I was worried it might be hard, but I was wrong. I was able to easily put it together by myself. It's good quality and is perfect for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: PattyGator

customer_reviews.title: Buy this cart!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is a fantastic addition to my kitchen. It holds my huge microwave and no wobble can even push it around. Was not hard to put together. The basket is great for potatoes and produce as it slides out. I keep my KitchenAid stand mixer on bottom shelf along with my food processor. It is a work horse. It is stainless steel so fingerprints are noticeable but really not an issue I have kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rhue

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Would be easier to assemble with an extra set of hands. I did it solo but would have been a much faster process with help. I can't get the wheels to lock but haven't put much effort into it either. Is just like the picture. Depending on what you might put in the basket or on the bottom shelf, it may need a piece of cardboard, shelf liner or wood so things don't fall through or tip.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: I like it it is sturdy . The drawer is nice but it does not slide good metal on metal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product, it serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, it serves it's purpose. I use it in my retail stores as a folding table for shirts. My only issue is that employees like to sit on it because it's on wheels. It will not support any serious weight. Any store that I have it in it is broken now from employees sitting on it or leaning on it to heavily. This is not an issue with the product itself but more a caution to people who might be using it for the same purpose. If your staff can't appreciate the products you provide to them you may have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Crysta

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: VERY sturdy! Better than II had hoped! I use this as a microwave/toaster oven cart. I put the dog treats in the basket shelf. It was very easy to put together....took only about 10 minutes start to finish. When it was together, I sat on it to make sure it was all locked into place (held my 140 lbs no problem). I love that it's on wheels so it's easy to move around when needed. Cleans up nicely with Windex.
customer_reviews.author: valann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Smaller Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy & useful cart. Does not take up a lot of space while being very handy & versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Velara

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this kitchen cart. It's really easy to assemble either the flat feet or the lockable wheels. I needed additional prep space plus better storage for winter root vegetables. This cart does both. It's just a hair higher on the wheels than my counters, but I didn't need it to be flush. It's really sturdy and high quality. It's a great value and classes up the joint.
customer_reviews.author: V. R. MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: will have this for years
customer_reviews.text: This was more money than I wanted to spend but I'm glad I bought it. If you have ever worked or seen a commercial kitchen at a restaurant this is the time top that they use. It's not going to rust or be scratched easily and its very sturdy. I will have this for years to come, and you can adjust the height of the basket and lower shelf if needed. Spend the extra money because its better than a wooden top
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Price was awesome too!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Found this after months of looking in stores and on-line. Perfect design, easy to assemble and very strong!!!!!! Locking wheels easy to use and it looks very sleek in our small apartment. Thank you Seville for a real Professional Grade product for the masses!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: My big kitchen aid mixer has found a home. I was having to pick it up and move it every time I used it. I had the cart put together by myself in about 10 minutes. It was so easy to follow instructions. I placed my mixer on the top shelf and used it from there. It did not shake or move while the mixer was running. After use I rolled it over to corner of kitchen. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! It took me a while to find what I needed/wanted for a small kitchen. We are using it for microwave and pots/pans. It’s sturdy and just the right size. Very good product for price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look at it
customer_reviews.text: This item, is grate. I gave it 3 stars, because the top part of the table was warped on one side which the made it wobble back and froth. I'm returning it back for exchange. Hopefully the second one will be straight. If not I require my full refund back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cart table...
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Strong. Sturdy. Easy to assemble. The wheels have breaks ( Nice feature). It will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase. I easily put it together myself and it looks like a million bucks. We have another one on the other side of the fridge now too.
customer_reviews.author: celesteskycop

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to assemble! And it really really is, not just something that they say. I use this table for two purposes. First I keep it in the laundry room and it serves as a shelf for clothes coming out of the dryer. Second when I'm going to do a lot of cooking I pulled into the kitchen and use it as an extra cabinet top
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Demos

customer_reviews.title: heavy, nice wheels
customer_reviews.text: I came all this way just to say it came with a dent in the side of the top. As long as I don't take it personally, the thing is a nice piece of moderna, holding bags of nuts, a few old bowls and an orange. Except for the dent I'd give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marriott

customer_reviews.title: this has been a lifesaver in my kitchen. I ...
customer_reviews.text: this has been a lifesaver in my kitchen. I place a portable dishwasher on top with cleaning supplies underneath. The wheels get caught in the small grooves of the tiling on occasion which could cause it to fall over if youre not careful but anything "top heavy" you can expect that from...just use common sense!
customer_reviews.author: Sylert

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy cart and holds my dehydrator on the top shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy cart and holds my dehydrator on the top shelf, my Vitamix and juicer on the bottom shelf. I do not like to leave these things on the counter. I can roll the cart out when I am using these items and roll it away when I am finished. I use the bin for all the information and recipes I use for dehydrating and juicing and raw "cooking."
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Great for for BBQ Smoker (after you adjust the height)
customer_reviews.text: Really nice cart. Easy to assemble. I got this for my BBQ smoker so I can wheel it around from garage to patio. I used a pipe cutter to actually trim the cart pole to about 1/2 the height. Very simple and easy to adjust the hight, since there are notches in the pipe, you can just use the pipe cutter and trim to your needs. You can pick a pipe cutter at Home Depot in the plumbing section. I was still able it use the baste even at 1/2 the height. Would definitely but this product again if I found another use for it.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Quality build. I also own their table and two of their wire racks. I use this for my portable dishwasher since my landlord is cheap and won't put in a full sized one. The struggle is real.
customer_reviews.author: Erich Meier

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This works great for the additional storage I needed in my kitchen. I didn't think of it when I purchased but the stainless top gets spots and you really have to pay attention to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Long

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: awesome quality perfect for my professional food grinder... strong, sturdy, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: ThatKat

customer_reviews.title: buy it, you'll like it
customer_reviews.text: the most I like the strength and look of it. when you put it together it's a good idea to wrap metal tape around the black snaps to keep them from moving, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy...well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cart,,, well made and very sturdy. Very easy to put together! Has heavy duty wheels that lock. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: lisajane

customer_reviews.title: Easy build.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart to hold my new SPT Countertop dishwasher. Be sure to use a rubber mallet to tamp down the shelf and basket over the little black spacers. Otherwise, it will fall apart as soon as you push it. Kind of comical in a way when it happened. Fortunately I didn't have my new dishwasher set on it!
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I searched a LOT to find a versatile kitchen island. My last apartment had a very small kitchen with limited counter space so I used it for meal prep. My new place is set up differently and has more counter space, but it's become the perfect shelf for my toaster oven and storage on the shelves. I'm very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: S. A. B.

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an accessory for my outdoor grill and it's perfect. Went together easily and is quite sturdy. On the deck I'm using the fixed feet. When the season changes I'll use it indoors as an auxiliary island in the kitchen and put on the castors. Well worth the money and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: goldrush

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Comparable to all other metal tables I shopped, this table is an awesome deal. Assembly was simple and well designed. I love it for my portable dishwasher (see pic). Sturdy wheels and materials. Great price. I cant figure out how to add a pic, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: RSP1961

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to put my Lodge Sportsman's grill on. conveniently rolls out when I use the grill and back when I'm done. No worry about firehazard and shelves for keeping all my accouterments for grill....and, it's attractive, durable and will probably last the lifetime of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and good quality. I have several Seville shelving units so I knew it would be sturdy. Great for my small kitchen. Use it for extra counter space and use the pull out bracket for fruits and potatoes. Good value for the money. Nice that it has locking rollers.
customer_reviews.author: DPberry

customer_reviews.title: stainless steel kitchen work table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my meat slicer and it is the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: james gunn

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for home use but not commercial quality
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly well made but not quite sturdy enough for commercial use. The stainless steel is cheap magnetic alloy not the quality non-magnetic alloy that most restaurant quality tables are made with. Still it should last a long time for home use and the price is good. The basket seems a bit flimsy but not going to be used much for my purpose anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Focker

customer_reviews.title: Seville Classic cart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to support commercial meat slicer. It does the job well. Was fairly easy to put together. Is sturdy and strong. Had to use version without wheels as it cannot move for our purpose. The shelf and basket underneath are handy. Being stainless it is very easy to clean. Good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Seville Classics Stainless-Steel Professional Kitchen Work Table Cart Utility NSF-Certified Storage, 24" W x 20" D x 36" H, Chrome
product_meta.description:
This versatile and multi-functional Seville Classics Stainless Steel Top Professional Kitchen Cart Workstation is constructed from industrial-strength chrome plated steel and accented by a sturdy easy to clean 1.5” thick stainless steel (#443) top. This durable and conveniently mobile (PVC wheels) cart is the obvious solution to your extra workspace needs. This professional grade utility cart is NSF certified for commercial use and has a generous weight capacity (300 lbs for the S.S. top, 100 lbs for the shelf and 50 lbs for the sliding basket). The ventilated steel wire shelf and 4” deep sliding basket can be adjusted at one-inch intervals putting within easy reach all your kitchen gadgets and tools. The cart measures 24” x 20” x 36” high. Easy assembly with no tools required. This sleek and modern mobile workstation is certain to inspire your inner chef and will provide the extra workspace you need in your kitchen, restaurant, workshop or gardening area.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This NSF certified Stainless Steel Professional Chef/Kitchen Table provides inspirational chef's with the work station they always wanted. Built from a sturdy stainless steel top and durable chrome plated steel, this mobile station can be easily rolled around the kitchen.
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS - 24" W x 20" D x 36" H; Top dimensions: 24" x 20" x 1.5" thick
STAINLESS-STEEL TABLE - Table top (24" x 20" x 1.5" thick) features solid, grade 443 stainless-steel construction with a brushed finish and bullnose front and rear sides.
SLIDING WIRE BASKET AND SHELF - Includes a pull-out storage basket (18.25" x 14.5" x 4" H) and steel wire shelf (24" x 20") with UltraDurable commercial-grade steel wire construction.
NSF-CERTIFIED STORAGE - Certified by the NSF to NSF/ANSI Standard 2 - Food Equipment for use in dry and heated storage environments.
BONUS 3" WHEELS - Includes smooth-rolling 3" diameter rubber swivel wheels (2 locking) for easy positioning in your garage, office, warehouse, workshop or home.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,120 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Limited 1-year manufacturer's warranty - seville classics products are backed by a 1-year limited warranty unless otherwise specified. The warranty protects against original defects in material or workmanship under normal home or office use for the duration of the warranty period.
specifications.Included Components: 4 poles, 1 bottom shelf, 1 stainless-steel top, 1 basket, 2 tracks
